entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:05 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:06 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
